extensionDescription.message: An addon to manage (view, search, create, edit, delete, backup, restore) cookies.

domainsListTitle.description: Title of the list that displays domains.

cookiesListTitle.description: Title of the list that displays cookies.

detailsPanelTitle.description: Title of the list that displays details for cookies.

cDomain.description: Attribute of a cookie in the details panel.

cFpiDomain.description: Attribute of a cookie in the details panel.

cName.description: Attribute of a cookie in the details panel.

cValue.description: Attribute of a cookie in the details panel.

cPath.description: Attribute of a cookie in the details panel.

checkboxQuerySubdomains.description: Checkbox for search engine, used to query subdomains.

selectQueryContexts.description: Text for search engine describing the content of the drop-down list of stores.

buttonClose.description: Close button on modal popovers and contextual menus.

contextMenu_domain_copy2Clipboard.description: Option for the contextual menu that opens on a domain.

contextMenu_domain_copy2File.description: Option for the contextual menu that opens on a domain.

contextMenu_domain_protect.description: Option for the contextual menu that opens on a domain.

contextMenu_domain_unprotect.description: Option for the contextual menu that opens on a domain.

contextMenu_domain_delete.description: Option for the contextual menu that opens on a domain.

contextMenu_domain_copy2container.description: Option for the contextual menu that opens on a domain.

container_all.description: Name that matches for all the stores in the browser.

container_default.description: Name of the default store in the browser.

container_private.description: Name of the Private browsing store.

tooltip_cDomain.message: A host-only cookie, applies only to the current domain. Other cookies also apply to subdomains, and their domain has a leading point.

tooltip_cFpiDomain.message: First-Party Isolation prevents third party trackers from using cookies to identify the user across different websites (see options).

tooltip_buttonUrl.description: Button to change url encoding of the current cookie value.

tooltip_buttonB64.description: Button to change url encoding of the current cookie value.

tooltip_cStore.message:
Browsing context
Select a context to make sure that the cookie is accessible in it.
tooltip_cStore.description: Select menu to modify the context of the current cookie (private/default/etc.).

tooltip_cHttpOnly.message:
Theft protection
Check to force the cookie to be sent only over HTTP(S),
i.e. block JavaScript access like in XSS context.
tooltip_cHttpOnly.description: Checkbox to change the httpOnly cookie flag.

tooltip_cIsSecure.message:
Theft protection
Check to force the cookie to be sent only over secure channels like HTTPS.
tooltip_cIsSecure.description: Checkbox to change the isSecure cookie flag.

tooltip_cIsSession.message:
Validity period
Check to force the cookie to expire at the end of the session.
tooltip_cIsSession.description: Checkbox to change the isSession cookie flag.

tooltipQuerySubdomains.message: Display also the cookies of the subdomains concerned by the selected domain
tooltipQuerySubdomains.description: Checkbox for search engine, used to query subdomains.

tooltipQueryContexts.message: Contexts are used to separate storage data by online activities without having to clear the browsing history, disconnect and reconnect, or use different browsers.
tooltipQueryContexts.description: Text for search engine describing the content of the drop-down list of stores.

tooltipRefresh.description: Global button to refresh the interface.

tooltipADelete.message: Delete all the cookies of the selected context
tooltipADelete.description: Button to delete all the cookies in the selected context.

tooltipcontributeContent.description: Button to show the popover about contribution.

tooltipSave.description: Button to save the current cookie.

tooltipEdit.message:
Unlock the gray fields
Allow to create a new cookie by editing the current one as a template.

tooltipCDelete.description: Button to delete the current cookie.

tooltipCProtect.message:
Erasure protection
When the padlock is closed, it means that a future deletion of this cookie by this addon will be refused.
tooltipCProtect.description: Button to protect or unprotect the current cookie from deletion.

contributeContent.message:
You can contribute to development in several ways:
  • If you would like to make a donation to reward the many hours of development, please consider this bitcoin address:
    15qduxA755YANqGcbd8VvBmm8DmR4rCg1i
  • You can rate the application on addons.mozilla.org.
  • Participate in the review of the code on the GitHub repository.
  • Talk about it around you!

modalClipboardTitle.description: Header that tells the user how many cookies are exported in the textarea.

noCookieAlert.description: Alert when there is no cookie in domain and cookie lists.

cookieRestoredSuccess.description: Alert when a file is imported with success.

cookieRestoredError.description: Alert when a file is imported with an error from the json parser.

cookieRestoredSingleError.message:
Error, at least one cookie was not restored.
$error$
Don't worry; normally these are session cookies that have expired.
cookieRestoredSingleError.description: Alert when a file is imported with an error during the save process.

oOpen_in_new_tab.message: Open Cookie Quick Manager in new tab

aboutBackupButton.message: Backup user data to a file

aboutRestoreButton.message: Restore user data from a file
aboutRestoreButton.description: Settings page: Restore user data from file

aboutOr.description: Settings page: Sentence between backup/restore buttons and the button to clear user data

oLicense.description: About page: Link for GitHub sources

oIssues.description: About page: Link for GitHub issues

oSwitchDomains.message: Switch to the list of domains

oSwitchCookies.message: Switch to the list of cookies
